df-rdg
blocks.content: Define a recursive definition generator on ` On ` (the class of ordinal numbers) with characteristic function ` F ` and initial value ` I ` . This combines functions ` F ` in ~ tfr1 and ` G ` in ~ tz7.44-1 into one definition. This rather amazing operation allows us to define, with compact direct definitions, functions that are usually defined in textbooks only with indirect self-referencing recursive definitions. A recursive definition requires advanced metalogic to justify - in particular, eliminating a recursive definition is very difficult and often not even shown in textbooks. On the other hand, the elimination of a direct definition is a matter of simple mechanical substitution. The price paid is the daunting complexity of our ` rec ` operation (especially when ~ df-recs that it is built on is also eliminated). But once we get past this hurdle, definitions that would otherwise be recursive become relatively simple, as in for example ~ oav , from which we prove the recursive textbook definition as theorems ~ oa0 , ~ oasuc , and ~ oalim (with the help of theorems ~ rdg0 , ~ rdgsuc , and ~ rdglim2a ). We can also restrict the ` rec ` operation to define otherwise recursive functions on the natural numbers ` _om ` ; see ~ fr0g and ~ frsuc . Our ` rec ` operation apparently does not appear in published literature, although closely related is Definition 25.2 of [Quine] p. 177, which he uses to "turn...a recursion into a genuine or direct definition" (p. 174). Note that the ` if ` operations (see ~ df-if ) select cases based on whether the domain of ` g ` is zero, a successor, or a limit ordinal. An important use of this definition is in the recursive sequence generator ~ df-seq on the natural numbers (as a subset of the complex numbers), allowing us to define, with direct definitions, recursive infinite sequences such as the factorial function ~ df-fac and integer powers ~ df-exp . _Note: We introduce_ ` rec ` _with the philosophical goal of being_ _able to eliminate all definitions with direct mechanical substitution_ _and to verify easily the soundness of definitions. Metamath itself_ _has no built-in technical limitation that prevents multiple-part_ _recursive definitions in the traditional textbook style_. (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-May-2015.)

thm rdgeq1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(crdg(c0, c2), crdg(c1, c2)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(crdg(c0, c2), crdg(c1, c2), crecs(cmpt(hs0, universe, cif(c2, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)))), crecs(cmpt(hs0, universe, cif(c2, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)))), wceq(c0, c1))
  syl(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(crecs(cmpt(hs0, universe, cif(c2, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)))), crecs(cmpt(hs0, universe, cif(c2, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))))), wceq(cmpt(hs0, universe, cif(c2, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))), cmpt(hs0, universe, cif(c2, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)))))
  mpteq2dv(hs0, universe, cif(c2, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)), cif(c2, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wceq(c0, c1))
  ifeq2d(c2, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  ifeq2d(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), cfv(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wceq(c0, c1), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0))))
  fveq1(c0, c1, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0)))))
  recseq(cmpt(hs0, universe, cif(c2, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))), cmpt(hs0, universe, cif(c2, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c1, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))))
  df-rdg(hs0, c0, c2)
  df-rdg(hs0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm rdgeq1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 = c1 ‚Üí rec(c0, c2)= rec(c1, c2))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(rec(c0, c2), rec(c1, c2), recs((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ if(hs0 = ‚àÖ, c2, if(Lim(dom(hs0)), ‚ãÉ ran(hs0),(c0 `(hs0 ` ‚ãÉ dom(hs0))))))), recs((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ if(hs0 = ‚àÖ, c2, if(Lim(dom(hs0)), ‚ãÉ ran(hs0),(c1 `(hs0 ` ‚ãÉ dom(hs0))))))), c0 = c1)
  syl(c0 = c1, recs((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ if(hs0 = ‚àÖ, c2, if(Lim(dom(hs0)), ‚ãÉ ran(hs0),(c0 `(hs0 ` ‚ãÉ dom(hs0)))))))= recs((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ if(hs0 = ‚àÖ, c2, if(Lim(dom(hs0)), ‚ãÉ ran(hs0),(c1 `(hs0 ` ‚ãÉ dom(hs0))))))), (hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ if(hs0 = ‚àÖ, c2, if(Lim(dom(hs0)), ‚ãÉ ran(hs0),(c0 `(hs0 ` ‚ãÉ dom(hs0))))))=(hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ if(hs0 = ‚àÖ, c2, if(Lim(dom(hs0)), ‚ãÉ ran(hs0),(c1 `(hs0 ` ‚ãÉ dom(hs0)))))))
  mpteq2dv(hs0, universe, if(hs0 = ‚àÖ, c2, if(Lim(dom(hs0)), ‚ãÉ ran(hs0),(c0 `(hs0 ` ‚ãÉ dom(hs0))))), if(hs0 = ‚àÖ, c2, if(Lim(dom(hs0)), ‚ãÉ ran(hs0),(c1 `(hs0 ` ‚ãÉ dom(hs0))))), c0 = c1)
  ifeq2d(c2, if(Lim(dom(hs0)), ‚ãÉ ran(hs0),(c0 `(hs0 ` ‚ãÉ dom(hs0)))), if(Lim(dom(hs0)), ‚ãÉ ran(hs0),(c1 `(hs0 ` ‚ãÉ dom(hs0)))), c0 = c1, hs0 = ‚àÖ)
  ifeq2d(‚ãÉ ran(hs0), (c0 `(hs0 ` ‚ãÉ dom(hs0))), (c1 `(hs0 ` ‚ãÉ dom(hs0))), c0 = c1, Lim(dom(hs0)))
  fveq1(c0, c1, (hs0 ` ‚ãÉ dom(hs0)))
  recseq((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ if(hs0 = ‚àÖ, c2, if(Lim(dom(hs0)), ‚ãÉ ran(hs0),(c0 `(hs0 ` ‚ãÉ dom(hs0)))))), (hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ if(hs0 = ‚àÖ, c2, if(Lim(dom(hs0)), ‚ãÉ ran(hs0),(c1 `(hs0 ` ‚ãÉ dom(hs0)))))))
  df-rdg(hs0, c0, c2)
  df-rdg(hs0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 = c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

  syl(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(crecs(cmpt(hs0, universe, cif(c0, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c2, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)))), crecs(cmpt(hs0, universe, cif(c1, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c2, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))))), wceq(cmpt(hs0, universe, cif(c0, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c2, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))), cmpt(hs0, universe, cif(c1, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c2, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)))))
  mpteq2dv(hs0, universe, cif(c0, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c2, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)), cif(c1, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c2, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)), wceq(c0, c1))
  ifeq1(c0, c1, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c2, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  recseq(cmpt(hs0, universe, cif(c0, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c2, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))), cmpt(hs0, universe, cif(c1, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c2, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))))
  df-rdg(hs0, c2, c0)
  df-rdg(hs0, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)

  diff.hs0.c(c1)

thm nfrdg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wnfc(s0, crdg(c0, c1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, crdg(c0, c1), crecs(cmpt(hs0, universe, cif(c1, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)))))
  df-rdg(hs0, c0, c1)
  nfrecs(s0, cmpt(hs0, universe, cif(c1, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))))
  nfmpt(s0, hs0, universe, cif(c1, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls)))
  nfcv(s0, universe)
  nfif(s0, c1, cif(cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  nfv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  nfif(s0, cuni(crn(cv(hs0))), cfv(c0, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))), wlim(cdm(cv(hs0))))
  nfv(s0, wlim(cdm(cv(hs0))))
  nfcv(s0, cuni(crn(cv(hs0))))
  nffv(s0, c0, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0)))))
  nfcv(s0, cfv(cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), emptycls)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
  diff.wlim.s(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, crn(cv(hs0)))
  diff.crn.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cv(hs0), cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, cdm(cv(hs0)))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, cv(hs0))

  diff.hs0.s(s0)

  nfmpt1(s0, universe, c4)
  eqid((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ c4))
  ndmfv(suc(c2), rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ c4), c3))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: rdgsucmpt2
blocks.content: This version of ~ rdgsucmpt avoids the not-free hypothesis of ~ rdgsucmptf by using two substitutions instead of one. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rdgsucmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, con0), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(c3, csuc(c0)), c1))
  -| wceq(c3, crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c5))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(c6, c4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cfv(c3, c0)), wceq(c6, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  rdgsucmptf(s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6)
  nfcv(s1, c5)
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  eqtr4i(c3, crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, c6), c5), crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c5))
  ax-mp(wceq(crdg(cmpt(s1, universe, c6), c5), crdg(cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c5)), wceq(cmpt(s1, universe, c6), cmpt(s0, universe, c4)))
  cbvmptv(s1, s0, universe, c6, c4)
  rdgeq1(cmpt(s1, universe, c6), cmpt(s0, universe, c4), c5)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

thm rdgsucmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà On ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(c3 ` suc(c0))= c1)
  ‚ä£ c3 = rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ c4), c5)
  ‚ä£ (s1 = s0 ‚Üí c6 = c4)
  ‚ä£ (s1 =(c3 ` c0)‚Üí c6 = c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  rdgsucmptf(s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c6)
  nfcv(s1, c5)
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfcv(s1, c1)
  eqtr4i(c3, rec((s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ c6), c5), rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ c4), c5))
  ax-mp(rec((s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ c6), c5)= rec((s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ c4), c5), (s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ c6)=(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ c4))
  cbvmptv(s1, s0, universe, c6, c4)
  rdgeq1((s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ c6), (s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ c4), c5)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: rdglim2
blocks.content: The value of the recursive definition generator at a limit ordinal, in terms of the union of all smaller values. (Contributed by NM, 23-Apr-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm rdglim2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wlim(c0)), wceq(cfv(crdg(c2, c3), c0), cuni(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(crdg(c2, c3), c0), cuni(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s1)))))), cuni(cima(crdg(c2, c3), c0)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wlim(c0)))
  rdglim(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wlim(c0), wceq(cuni(cima(crdg(c2, c3), c0)), cuni(cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s1))))))))
  unieqd(cima(crdg(c2, c3), c0), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s1))))), wlim(c0))
  syl5eq(cima(crdg(c2, c3), c0), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s1))))), cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), crdg(c2, c3))))), wlim(c0))
  dfima3(s0, s1, crdg(c2, c3), c0)
  abbidv(s0, wlim(c0), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), crdg(c2, c3)))), wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s1)))))
  syl5rbb(wlim(c0), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), crdg(c2, c3)))), wrex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s1)))), wex(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s1))))))
  df-rex(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s1))))
  exbidv(s1, wlim(c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s1)))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), crdg(c2, c3))))
  pm5.32d(wlim(c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), crdg(c2, c3)))
  syl6(wlim(c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wb(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), crdg(c2, c3))), wcel(cv(s1), con0))
  syl(wlim(c0), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), con0)), word(c0))
  limord(c0)
  syl6ibr(word(c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s1), con0), word(cv(s1)))
  ex(word(c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), word(cv(s1)))
  ordelord(c0, cv(s1))
  elon(cv(s1))
  vex(s1)
  syl5bb(wcel(cv(s1), con0), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s1))), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), crdg(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s1)), cv(s0)))
  eqcom(cv(s0), cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s1)))
  mpan(wcel(cv(s1), con0), wb(wceq(cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s1)), cv(s0)), wcel(cop(cv(s1), cv(s0)), crdg(c2, c3))), wfn(crdg(c2, c3), con0))
  rdgfnon(c2, c3)
  fnopfvb(crdg(c2, c3), con0, cv(s1), cv(s0))
  diff.crdg.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.crdg.s(s1, c2, c3)
  diff.wlim.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wlim.s(s1, c0)
}

thm rdglim2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß Lim(c0))‚Üí(rec(c2, c3)` c0)= ‚ãÉ { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0 =(rec(c2, c3)` s1))})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  eqtrd((rec(c2, c3)` c0), ‚ãÉ { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0 =(rec(c2, c3)` s1))}, ‚ãÉ(rec(c2, c3)" c0), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß Lim(c0)))
  rdglim(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c1, Lim(c0), ‚ãÉ(rec(c2, c3)" c0)= ‚ãÉ { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0 =(rec(c2, c3)` s1))})
  unieqd((rec(c2, c3)" c0), { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0 =(rec(c2, c3)` s1))}, Lim(c0))
  syl5eq((rec(c2, c3)" c0), { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0 =(rec(c2, c3)` s1))}, { s0 | ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß < s1, s0 > ‚àà rec(c2, c3)))}, Lim(c0))
  dfima3(s0, s1, rec(c2, c3), c0)
  abbidv(s0, Lim(c0), ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß < s1, s0 > ‚àà rec(c2, c3))), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0 =(rec(c2, c3)` s1)))
  syl5rbb(Lim(c0), ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß < s1, s0 > ‚àà rec(c2, c3))), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, s0 =(rec(c2, c3)` s1)), ‚àÉ(s1,(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 =(rec(c2, c3)` s1))))
  df-rex(s1, c0, s0 =(rec(c2, c3)` s1))
  exbidv(s1, Lim(c0), (s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 =(rec(c2, c3)` s1)), (s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß < s1, s0 > ‚àà rec(c2, c3)))
  pm5.32d(Lim(c0), s1 ‚àà c0, s0 =(rec(c2, c3)` s1), < s1, s0 > ‚àà rec(c2, c3))
  syl6(Lim(c0), s1 ‚àà c0, (s0 =(rec(c2, c3)` s1)‚Üî < s1, s0 > ‚àà rec(c2, c3)), s1 ‚àà On)
  syl(Lim(c0), (s1 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà On), Ord(c0))
  limord(c0)
  syl6ibr(Ord(c0), s1 ‚àà c0, s1 ‚àà On, Ord(s1))
  ex(Ord(c0), s1 ‚àà c0, Ord(s1))
  ordelord(c0, s1)
  elon(s1)
  vex(s1)
  syl5bb(s1 ‚àà On, s0 =(rec(c2, c3)` s1), < s1, s0 > ‚àà rec(c2, c3), (rec(c2, c3)` s1)= s0)
  eqcom(s0, (rec(c2, c3)` s1))
  mpan(s1 ‚àà On, ((rec(c2, c3)` s1)= s0 ‚Üî < s1, s0 > ‚àà rec(c2, c3)), rec(c2, c3)[Fn]On)
  rdgfnon(c2, c3)
  fnopfvb(rec(c2, c3), con0, s1, s0)
  diff.crdg.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.crdg.s(s1, c2, c3)
  diff.wlim.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wlim.s(s1, c0)
}

blocks.name: rdglim2a
blocks.content: The value of the recursive definition generator at a limit ordinal, in terms of indexed union of all smaller values. (Contributed by NM, 28-Jun-1998.)
blocks.origin:
thm rdglim2a(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wlim(c0)), wceq(cfv(crdg(c2, c3), c0), ciun(s0, c0, cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  syl6eqr(cfv(crdg(c2, c3), c0), ciun(s0, c0, cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s0))), cuni(cab(hs0, wrex(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wlim(c0)))
  rdglim2(hs0, s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  dfiun2(s0, hs0, c0, cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s0)))
  fvex(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(crdg(c2, c3), cv(s0)))
}

thm rdglim2a(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß Lim(c0))‚Üí(rec(c2, c3)` c0)= ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c0,(rec(c2, c3)` s0)))
